Summary: Biochemical reaction from sulfamethoxazole hydroxylamine to 4-nitrososulfamethoxazole.
Biochemical reaction from sulfamethoxazole to sulfamethoxazole hydroxylamine. This interaction is catalyzed by MPO.
Biochemical reaction from 4-nitrososulfamethoxazole to sulfamethoxazole hydroxylamine.
Biochemical reaction from sulfamethoxazole to n-acetyl sulfamethoxazole. This interaction can be catalyzed by NAT2 or NAT1.
